title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.260 - Useful life
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.260 - Useful life

State Regulations

Normal operating life in terms of utility to the owner: said of a fixed asset or a fixed-asset group; the period may be more or less
than physical life or any commonly recognized economic life; service
life. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.260

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
